column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat has some of the best fried pickles I've ever had
column2: for starters. I've also enjoyed the taco salad (no goat chili for me please!) a number of times
column3: and it never disappoints. The tuna melt is also really really great
column5: given the unbelievable cheese on top. Everything I have tasted or people I am with have tasted has been truly great.
